GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article corresponding to path article_id

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Another article about Mitch
article.body: There will never be enough articles about Mitch!

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments corresponding to path article_id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: POSTs a comment to the comments table and serves a comment corresponding to the POSTed comment

comment.author: butter_bridge
comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: PATCHs an articles vote property on the articles table and serves an article corresponding to the PATCHed article

article.title: Another article about Mitch
article.body: There will never be enough articles about Mitch!
